titles.title: A bill to make the provisions of title IV of the Trade Act of 1974 applicable to Cambodia.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5558)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/11/1994--Introduced. Declares that the human rights and emigration provisions of the Trade Act of 1974 shall apply to Cambodia for purposes of determining its eligibility to receive nondiscriminatory treatment (most-favored-nation status).
